RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 83000. (UP TO $14,442 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (For Horses That Sold or RNA for $50,000 Or Less In Their Most Recent Sale).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CATIRE VIZCAYA broke very alertly and went straight to the front, set the pace under pressure to his outside, vied along the rail on the turn, was asked for his best in upper stretch, came under a left-handed crop outside the furlong marker, drifted out into the final furlong, bumped with the runner-up when that foe came in to meet him outside the sixteenth-pole and proved best under good handling. WALSTIB settled comfortably on the outside, was roused three wide on the turn, gained passing the five-sixteenths, rallied four wide into the stretch, made an outside bid at the three-sixteenths, fought on even terms for the lead into the final furlong, came in under a right-handed crop outside the sixteenth-pole then bumped with the winner, was taken in hand while near the heels of that foe shortly thereafter and was outfinished while clear for the place. SECRET LOVER bumped with a rival at the start, settled off the pace, was roused late on the backstretch, saved ground while ridden along on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and safely secured the show while no threat to the top two. UNCLE EDDIE bumped with a rival just after the start, was urged along towards the front, went around the turn in the two path and tired. THREEWHITESOLDIERS was bumped at the start then taken up in tight between foes, drifted out early, was urged along at the rear, went three wide on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and failed to threaten. FIRST TRUMPET bumped with a foe shortly after the break, pressed the pace on the outside then in the two path on the turn and capitulated. AWESOME FOR SURE settled off the pace, was roused four wide on the turn and failed to respond. STUNNEM came inward at the start, drifted out early, drifted out again inside the three-quarter pole, went five wide on the turn, drifted in inside the furlong marker and was no factor in a green effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Stunnem
ENTRY.OWNER: Bishop Chester A and Hinkson Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,drift out,drift out5-1/2,5w turn,drift in,green

ENTRY.NAME: Catire Vizcaya
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly,set pressured pace,ins trn,drft out 1/8,bmpd,respond

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,settled,asked1/2,inside turn,no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Threewhitesoldiers
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,tkn up,drft out,at rear,3p turn,mvd out 3/16,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Eddie
ENTRY.OWNER: Deeb Dennis L and Seery Terence V
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd after brk,urged along,2path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: First Trumpet
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd after brk,pressed outside,vied 2path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Walstib
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled out,3w trn,gain4w1/4,bid3/16,came in ins1/8,bmpd,outfnshd

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome for Sure
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, roused 4wide turn, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 95000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FEATHERS ROAD coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tucked inside straightened away and was in behind COURAGEOOUS OH LA and altered out to the two path at the three-sixteenths and then the three path near the eighth pole, split foes at that station and was bumped nearing the sixteenth marker by GOLDEN ARM coming in under a right handed crop, dug in being flashed the crop to the left side and was just up in the last jump to the wire to score. EMPIRE SKY four wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out six wide into upper stretch, closed well outside and just missed at the finish. NEWPORT BRIDGE hustled from the gate, raced forwardly placed advancing to duel with COURAGEOOUS OH LA inside the half mile pole, tucked to the two path and knocked heads through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole before being set down spinning three wide into upper stretch taking over narrow command, dug in under a drive clinging to the front and fending off rivals to the outside, then got nailed in the final jumps by a pair. GOLDEN ARM broke out at the start under hustling and bumped HIGH TONE, chased three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole before being let out swinging four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive, came in under a right handed crop and bumped FEATHERS ROAD nearing the sixteenth pole, then missed at the end. COURAGEOOUS OH LA coaxed from the gate, led early on before being engaged by NEWPORT BRIDGE to the outside half a mile from home, knocked heads through the turn coaxed along, spun just off the inside into upper stretch displaced from the front, then weakened in the late stages. HE'S GOT IT coaxed from the start, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, closed in to the finish but was outkicked. DREAMPOINT chased along the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid but was outkicked. HIGH TONE got bumped at the start by GOLDEN ARM, who broke outwards, chased six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung seven wide into upper stretch and made no impact. ON OUR WAY BOYZ lunged at the break bobbling when he landed and conceded two lengths to the front, chased three then two wide coaxed along from midway on the turn, angled five wide into upper stretch and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Dreampoint
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, mild bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Feathers Road
ENTRY.OWNER: A Shares Stables and Rice Linda
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p,2w 1/4, ins str, alter 3p 1/8, split foes,up

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: A Shares Stables, LLC & Linda Rice

ENTRY.NAME: Courageoous Oh La
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, led early, dueled ins from 1/2, 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: On Our Way Boyz
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged, bobbled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Empire Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, closed well, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: He's Got It
ENTRY.OWNER: LaPlace Donald and League of Their Own Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 5w backstretch, coaxed 3w 3/8, 4-5w upper, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Arm
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, hustled, chased 3w, let out 4w uppr, dug in, missed

ENTRY.NAME: High Tone
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 6-7w, 4w turn, 7w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Newport Bridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, dueled 4-2w, set down up 3w upper, dug in, nailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 101. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTICAL CURLIN was sent hard to the front, dropped from the two path to the rail on the first turn, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the far turn, was given his cue at the five-sixteenths, responded well when put to a right-handed crop in upper stretch, was given one final pop of the crop under threat from the runner-up outside the sixteenth-pole then held sway under a strong hand-ride to the finish. MONEY SUPPLY went around the first turn in the two path, settled off the pace, was asked while inside on the far turn, came out under a drive while gaining into upper stretch, pursued the winner under a right-handed crop into the final sixteenth, switched to a left-handed crop late and finished with good courage but missed while well clear for the place. MIGHTY ATLAS was asked some leaving the gate, rounded the first turn in the two path, settled on the outside, was roused near the half-mile pole, moved from the two path to the four path while ridden along on the far turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, was carried out near the furlong marker and weakened but just earned the show. SKYLANDER went four then three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was asked in the three path on the turn, chased into the final furlong and tired. ST. ELMO bumped with a rival at the start, went three then two wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the two path on the far turn, chased into upper stretch and came up empty. WHAT'S UP DOC hugged the rail on the first turn, was reserved towards the rear, moved from the rail to the two path while roused on the far turn, angled out in upper stretch and failed to rally.

ENTRY.NAME: What's Up Doc
ENTRY.COMMENT: hugged rail 1st,reserved,ask ins-2p2nd turn,angled out,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: St. Elmo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,3-2p1st,stlkd outside,ask2p2nd turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Money Supply
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled,ask rail 2nd turn,came out 1/4,chased,good courage

ENTRY.NAME: Mistical Curlin
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Gustavo Gurdon Andrew O Poyah Anil and Vialet Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard,2p-ins1st,pace,ins2nd,ask5/16,responded,held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Skylander
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3p1st,settled outside,ask3p2nd,chased,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mighty Atlas
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled outside,ask1/2,2-4p2nd,carried out1/8,earned show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 156000. (PURSE $120,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $27,144 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCOCCIATORE hustled from the gate, vied early on from the two path with a pair before shaking those rivals off half a mile from home, showed the way through the turn patiently handled and got set down taking the inside route at the quarter pole before floating back to the two path straightened away, drew off under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and held safe kept to task drifting out at the end. BOLD JOURNEY stumbled at the start recovering inwards and bumping a pair of rivals against pressure inside coming from OSBOURNE, who broke outwards, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, angled in a furlong out and closed in well to secure the place honors. SKY AND SAND bumped between foes at the start, vied early on from the four path loosely between rivals, came under coaxing three wide at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and kept on to secure the show honors. MY HARBORS DREAM shied out at the start filling the space left vacant by OSBOURNE, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung two to three wide for home and kept on to the finish. OSBOURNE broke out at the start bumping a pair of rivals between against pressure outside from BOLD JOURNEY, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and weakened. CHAMPIONS DREAM coaxed from the gate, vied six then five wide early on with a pair to his inside, chased four wide through the turn under coaxing from three furlongs out, went six wide into upper stretch and tired. MONDAY MORNING QB got bumped between foes and was pinched back at the start but only conceded a length before settling into stride, crossed to chase along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Scocciatore
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, vied early 2p, led turn, ins 1/4, drew off, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: My Harbors Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied out st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Osbourne
ENTRY.OWNER: Moquett Ron Tauber Mark Floyd Sagely Properties LTD Johnston Keith F and LaPenta
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 7/16, 7w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Monday Morning Qb
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump btw, pinched st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sky and Sand
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump btw st, vied early btw 4w, 3w turn, 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Journey
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable and Barber Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Champions Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, vied 6-5w early, 4w turn, 6w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1 3/16M Turf CR: 106. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 156000. (PURSE $120,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $27,144 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Eighth on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAR OAK settled on the inside, was roused on the far turn, swung four wide into the stretch, rallied to make a bid inside the furlong, battled gamely to the finish and narrowly prevailed. ENGLISH CONQUEROR went around the first turn in the two path, tracked the pace on the outside, engaged the leader in the two path on the far turn, spun three wide into the stretch, took the lead inside the three-sixteenths, led under a drive into the final sixteenth, swapped back to his inside lead late and was denied while just able to get the place. CROSS BORDER went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was roused near the seven-sixteenths pole, chased three wide on the far turn, spun five wide into the stretch, pursued the leaders into the final furlong, made a bid outside the sixteenth-pole, battled with multiple rivals to the finish and just missed while able to get the show. JAMES ALOYSIUS went to the front, showed the way on the inside while tugging hard on the bit under stout restraint, was let out then asked on the far turn, turned into the stretch in the two path, was headed under a drive inside the three-sixteenths, fought on determinedly in the final furlong but missed the trifecta. NOBEL (IRE) went around the first turn in the two path, was unhurried at the back, came under urging while moving from the two path to the four path on the far turn, drifted inward in upper stretch, dropped further in near the furlong marker, chased the vanguard to the finish and lacked the needed kick then suffered a catastrophic injury on the gallop out and was euthanized on the course. CATCH THAT PARTY saved ground on the first turn, settled off the pace, was roused to to three wide on the far turn, chased the vanguard in the stretch and lacked the needed response. DYNADRIVE traveled three wide on the first turn, was reserved on the outside but with the benefit of cover, moved out from behind cover outside the half-mile pole, was asked four wide on the far turn then driven six wide into the stretch, chased outside into the final furlong and also lacked the needed response.

ENTRY.NAME: Dynadrive
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying P Stable and Schurman James F
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,reserved outside with cover,mvd out1/2,4w2nd,6w1/4,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Catch That Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,settled,roused 2-3path 2nd turn,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: English Conqueror
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,tracked outside,bid 2p2nd trn,3p1/4,led ins3/16-1/16,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Bear Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside,swung 4wide 1/4,rallied,bid ins1/8,gamely prevaild

ENTRY.NAME: Nobel (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of YOR

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,unhurried,ask 2-4p2nd,mvd in 1/8,chsd,injured gallop out

ENTRY.NAME: James Aloysius
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,pulled,pace tight hold,inside,ask2nd,2p1/4,fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Cross Border
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,settled outside,ask7/16,chsd3w2nd,5w1/4,good courage

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUST F Y I five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive steadily wearing down the leader to just get up in the shadow of the wire. SHOP LIFTING coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took over command and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive under lone threat and was nailed on the wire when getting a bit leg weary in the late stages. SHE'S WICKED SMART coaxed from the start, chased along the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive, had the rider flash the crop to the right side and shied in near the sixteenth pole while keeping on to secure the show honors. HERE'SYOURTROUBLE six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide for home and offered up a mild kick. COLONIAL ROSE broke out at the start trading a bump with ANTENNA, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and stayed on one paced to the finish. LADY DE BERRY broke a half a beat slow, chased three to four wide until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing inside the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and offered no response. ANTENNA broke in at the start trading a bump with COLONIAL ROSE, chased four wide down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing three furlongs out, angled six wide into upper stretch and offered no response. COWGIRL CHARM coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and weakened. WILLOWY coaxed from the start, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn, went five wide into upper stretch and made no impact. LIFE'S JOY coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside through the turn coming under threat with five-sixteenths to run, yielded the front nearing the quarter pole and cut the corner into upper stretch, then tired in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: She's Wicked Smart
ENTRY.OWNER: John Grossi's Racing Corp and Falcone Jr Robert N
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, 2w 1/4p, shied in 1/16p, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Colonial Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Antenna
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and Barber Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, 4w early, tucked 2p turn, angled 6w uppr, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Shop Lifting
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, up 2w 1/4p, dug in, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Lady de Berry
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slow, chased 3-4w, coaxed ins turn, ins 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirl Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Willowy
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 6w backstretch, 3w turn, 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Here'syourtrouble
ENTRY.OWNER: Bradley Thoroughbreds Laura Leigh Stable Estes Scott and Cambron Equine LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-7w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Just F Y I
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Life's Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, ins turn, yielded, cut corner, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Forego S. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 118. Stakes Purse 500000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $500 each which should accompany the nomination; $3,500 to pass the entry box and an additional $4,000 to start . For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $2,500 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided accordingly $275,000 to the winner, $100,000 to second, $60 ,000 to third, $30,000 to fourth, $20,000 to fifth and $15,000 divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a Grade One since September 1, 2022 allowed 2 lbs.; of a Grade Two since then allowed 4 lbs.; of a Graded Sweep stake in 2023 allowed 6 lbs. Trophies will be presented to the winning owner, trainer and jockey. Closed Saturday, August 12, 2023 with 12 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUNITE showed good speed, set the pace under pressure to his outside while well off the rail, moved in late on the backstretch, vied in the two path on the turn, responded well when asked at the quarter-pole, remained on his inside lead under a strong hand-ride in upper stretch, was put to a right-handed crop at the furlong marker, swapped to the proper lead while guided in closer to the runner-up approaching the sixteenth-pole and held sway under strong urging. ELITE POWER settled just off the pace while off the inside, moved in late in the backstretch, drafted inside on the turn, was asked while cutting the corner into the stretch, chased along the rail under a drive into the final sixteenth and failed to reach the winner while clear for the place. HIGH OAK settled off the pace, was roused in the two path on the turn, swung four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. PIPELINE was hustled from the gate, showed speed on the outside of GUNITE, was taken under a hold and backed off to press the leader outside the five-eighths pole, vied in the three path on the turn, dropped back under a drive in upper stretch and tired. SYNTHESIS leaned out and brushed the gate, settled on the outside, was roused four wide on the turn, came under the crop near the five-sixteenths, was driven five wide into the stretch and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: High Oak
ENTRY.OWNER: LRE Racing LLC and JEH Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,asked 2path turn,4w into lane,best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Gunite
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,set pressured pace,2p turn,ask1/4,responded,held driving

ENTRY.NAME: Elite Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,just off pace,ins turn,ask1/4,chased rail,second best

ENTRY.NAME: Pipeline
ENTRY.OWNER: Gunther, John D. and Eurowest Bloodstock Services
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,outside speed,in hand5-1/2,pressed,3p turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Synthesis
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned out,brushed gate,settled outside,4w turn,5w1/4,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 5 1/2F Turf CR: 99. Allowance Purse 149500. (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOUPER QUEST broke in at the start brushing NOTAH, showed the way in hand three then two wide, briefly took to the rail at the five-sixteenths, floated out four wide into upper stretch, drew off under a drive and was geared down inside the final sixteenth to the finish. ACOUSTIC AVE chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, closed well to secure the place honors. HARRY TIME (IRE) chased along the inside, got set down spinning two to three wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors. HIGHLY FLAMMABLE chased three to four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. DETROIT CITY chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. NOTAH got brushed at the start by SOUPER QUEST, who broke inwards, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn, swung five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. HANDSOME CAT broke a half a beat slow, then got bumped at the start by MONET NEVER, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and made no impact. EXTENDO chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide for home and weakened. TALKIN PHAROAH chased two to three wide until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. MONET NEVER (IRE) broke out at the start bumping HANDSOME CAT, chased along the inside under a ride from the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Monet Never (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Lindy Farms and Ice Wine Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased inside, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Handsome Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slw, bumped st, chased 2-3w, 7w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Talkin Pharoah
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed ins 5/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Harry Time (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, set down 2-3w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Flammable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Acoustic Ave
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, angled 6w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Detroit City
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Extendo
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w backstretch, coaxed 2p 5/16, 3-4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Notah
ENTRY.OWNER: Gatsas Stables R A Hill Stable and Swick Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed st, 5w backstretch, 3w turn, 5w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, in hand 3-2w, floated 4w upper, drew off, geared down

RACE.RACE_TEXT: H. Allen Jerkens Memorial S. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 116. Stakes Purse 500000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $500 each which should accompany the nomination; $3,500 to pass the entry box and an additional $4,000 to start. For hors es not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $2,500 in addition to the entry and starting fees) may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided accordingly, $275,000 to the winner, $100,000 to second, $60,000 tot hird, $30,000 to fourth, $20,000 to fifth and $15,000 divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 124 lbs. Non-winners of a Grade One in 2023, or two Grade Two Sweepstakes in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of a Grade One or Grade Two Sweepstake allowedd 4 lbs.; of a Graded Sweepstake allowed 6 lbs. Trophies will be presented to the winning owner, trainer and jockey. Closed Saturday, August 12, 2023 with 11 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE IN VERMILLION dropped well behind the rest of the field, moved from the rail to the two path under strong urging on the turn, swung seven wide into the stretch under a left-handed crop then drifted out before being straightened by the rider, gained into the final furlong, inherited the front when the leader was injured outside the sixteenth-pole and prevailed under good handling. VERIFYING settled off the pace, dropped back leaving the backstretch, was urged two to three wide on the turn, moved out in upper stretch, chased into the final furlong, swerved out to avoid the injured foe near the sixteenth-pole, inherited the advantage briefly at that juncture but was overtaken while able to get the place. ARABIAN LION pressed the pace on the outside, was asked in the three then four path on the turn, lost touch with the leader near the quarter-pole, spun five wide into the stretch, chased into the final furlong, moved out to avoid the spill near the sixteenth-pole and was well clear for the show. FORT BRAGG broke out and glanced the hindquarters of a rival while off a step slow, was rated on the outside, dropped back leaving the backstretch, was urged three to four wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and weakened. DREW'S GOLD settled just off the pace, dropped back leaving the backstretch, saved ground under urging on the turn and faltered. NEW YORK THUNDER went to the front, showed the way under pressure from the outside, vied in the two then three path on the turn, shook clear nearing the quarter-pole then spun four wide into the stretch, drew off into the final furlong, suffered a catastrophic injury outside the sixteenth-pole and fell then was euthanized on the track.

ENTRY.NAME: Drew's Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Chapman, James K. and Tsujimoto, Stuart
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled just off pace,drop back 7/16,urged inside turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: One in Vermillion
ENTRY.COMMENT: well behind,ins-2path turn,swung 7w1/4,drift out3/16,gained,up

ENTRY.NAME: Verifying
ENTRY.OWNER: Westerberg Magnier Mrs John Poulin Jonathan Smith Derrick and Tabor Michael B
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,urged 2-3path turn,mvd out3/16,chsd,swerve out1/16,up2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Fort Bragg
ENTRY.OWNER: SF Racing LLC Starlight Racing Madaket Stables LLC Masterson Robert E Stonestree
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,bmp foes hindquarters,step slw,3-4p,6p1/4,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: New York Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,2-3path turn,4p1/4,drew off,injured,fell

ENTRY.NAME: Arabian Lion
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,3-4wide turn,5p1/4,chased,mvd out late,clear show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ballerina H. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 10 7F Dirt CR: 108. Stakes Purse 500000. A HANDICAP FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ECHO ZULU coaxed from the gate, cut the pace three then two wide under pressure from GOODNIGHT OLIVE to the outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat to the outside a furlong out, rebuffed the challenge and edged clear to the finish to prevail. GOODNIGHT OLIVE coaxed from the start, knocked heads early on before easing off to prompt the aforementioned foe from the outside four then three wide, got set down spinning four wide into upper stretch, dug in bidding to threaten a furlong out, then got repelled by the top one while running on well clear of the rest to be along second best. MATAREYA chased along the inside getting placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, weakened while just preserving the show honors over a rival on the wire. CARAMEL SWIRL chased five then four wide coming under coaxing and advancing to stack outside the top pair three furlongs from home, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and weakened just missing for the show honors. DR B broke out at the start and was corrected, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. STERLING SILVER just off the inside early on, chased three then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and tired. MARYQUITECONTRARY chased five wide throughout under prolonged coaxing from the half mile pole and was unable to make an impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Sterling Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p early, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Matareya
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Maryquitecontrary
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w pursuit, coaxed along 1/2, 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Dr B
ENTRY.OWNER: Cash is King LLC and LC Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Echo Zulu
ENTRY.OWNER: L and N Racing LLC and Winchell Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, cut pace 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Goodnight Olive
ENTRY.OWNER: First Row Partners and Team Hanley
ENTRY.COMMENT: coax st, prompted 4-3w, set down 4w uppr, bid, repelled, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Caramel Swirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, advanced 3/8, 4-5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Resorts World Casino Sword Dancer S. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 11 1 1/2M Inner turf CR: 113. Stakes Purse 750000. INNER TURF FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOLSHOI BALLET (IRE) was well placed just off the pace on the inside, came off the hedge early on the backstretch, made a bid with a half-mile to run, vied in the two path while between horses on the final turn, kicked clear in upper stretch then was given one pop of a right-handed crop outside the furlong marker, came out when given one pop of a left-handed crop inside that marker then was placed under a brisk hand-ride to the finish while much the best. SOLDIER RISING (GB) was hustled from the gate, settled at the rear while saving ground, moved off hedge on the backstretch, was asked inside the half-mile pole, went three then four wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and finished willingly for the place. PIONEERING SPIRIT angled in nearing the first turn, settled towards the back on the inside, came off the rail midway through the second turn, was urged three wide on the final turn then driven four wide into the stretch and weakened while able to get the show. DAUNT was hustled from the gate then taken in hand before the first turn, raced in the two path while rated on the outside of a foe but with some cover, made a bid with a half-mile to run, was asked near the three-eighths pole, vied in the three path on the far turn and came up empty. STONE AGE (IRE) stalked the pace on the outside in the two path, took the lead outside the five-eighths pole, vied inside under urging on the far turn, was headed coming to the quarter-pole, lost touch with the winner in upper stretch and tired. CHANNEL MAKER was hustled to the front, showed the way on the inside with company to his outside, came under coaxing onto the backstretch, lost the lead outside the five-eighths, was urged along off the pace from that point, chased inside on the final turn and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Soldier Rising (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC Dubb Michael Bailey Morris Wonder Stables and Caruso Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: hstld,settled ins,off hedge backstretch,3-4w3rd turn,5w1/4,clr2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bolshoi Ballet (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of ASC

ENTRY.OWNER: Westerberg Magnier Mrs John Smith Derrick and Tabor Michael B
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside,off hedge 5/8,bid1/2,btwn 2p3rd,kicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: Daunt
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,in hand,rated out 2path,bid1/2,ask3/8,3p3rd,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Pioneering Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,settled inside,2p mid 2nd turn,urged 3w3rd,4w1/4,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Channel Maker
ENTRY.OWNER: Wachtel Stable Barber Gary R A Hill Stable and Reeves Thoroughbred Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,inside pace,coaxed5-1/2,headed out5/8,urged,ins,tired

ENTRY.OWNER: Westerberg Brant Peter M Magnier Mrs John Smith Derrick and Tabor Michael B

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Travers S. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 12 1 1/4M Dirt CR: 108. Stakes Purse 1250000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $1,250 each which should accompany the nomination; $9,000 to pass the entry box and an additional $9,750 to start. For ho rses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $12,500 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse for the Travers shall be divided as follows: $687,500 to the owner of the winner , $250,000 to second, $150,000 to third, $75,000 to fourth, $50,000 to fifth and 37,500 divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 126 lbs. The Travers winner is eligible for a bonus from the Japan Racing Association if said winner is selecte d and runs in the 2023 Champions Cup. Trophies will be presented to the winning owner, trainer and jockey. Closed Saturday, August 12, 2023 with 16 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARCANGELO got brushed at the start by FORTE and then got pinched back after the start along with MAGE as FORTE and NATIONAL TREASURE came together, chased just off the inside past the stands until tucked inside nearing the first turn, advanced to be forwardly placed briefly before tipping out briefly three wide into the backstretch taking up residence in mid pack, tipped three wide five furlongs from home when FORTE tipped four wide, then tipped four wide into the far turn coming under light coaxing at the seven-sixteenths and advancing to issue a bid five-sixteenths from home, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and rallied to take command three-sixteenths from home, drifted in steadily being flashed a left handed crop and edged clear to the eighth pole, then held safe kept to task to the finish. DISARM saved ground near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, dug in under a drive offering up a mild kick, tipped out to the two path seventy yards from home and was along clear for the place honors. TAPIT TRICE broke a length slow without incident and was last early on, raced four wide through the first turn advancing outside rivals, continued to advance four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch to be just off the pace, went three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung two to three wide into upper stretch and kept on under a drive to preserve the show honors clear of the rest. FORTE broke out at the start brushing ARCANGELO before pinching that rival back in tandem with NATIONAL TREASURE while also squeezing back MAGE, raced just off the inside through the first turn, tipped three wide down the backstretch, then briefly tipped four wide nudging MAGE five wide with five furlongs to run, tucked back to the two path into the far turn and was placed to light coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and weakened through the final furlong. NATIONAL TREASURE three wide through the first turn, prompted the leader from the outside three wide coming under prolonged coaxing half a mile from home, began to fade after the midway point on the far turn and continued three wide into upper stretch, then weakened through to the finish. SCOTLAND established the front shortly after the start and showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under accompaniment from a pair six furlongs from home, tucked inside at the half mile pole, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, clung to command and spun just off the inside into upper stretch under challenge from a trio, yielded the front with three-sixteenths to go and weakened through to the wire. MAGE got pinched out after the start in tandem with ARCANGELO due to pressure outside from NATIONAL TREASURE and inside from FORTE, chased three wide through the first turn before going four wide down the backstretch, had FORTE tip out along his inside and was bumped five wide briefly five furlongs from home, tucked four then three wide nearing the half mile pole, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Forte
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 2p 1st turn, chased 3-4w, 2p far turn, 6w uppr, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Arcangelo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinch after st, 2-3w early, 4w bid 5/16, 4-5w uppr, up, clr, safe

ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slw, 4w 1st turn, advanced 4-5w, 2-3w upper, kept on

ENTRY.COMMENT: pinch after st,3w 1st turn, 4-5w, coaxed 3w 7/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: National Treasure
ENTRY.OWNER: SF Racing LLC Starlight Racing Madaket Stables LLC Masterson Robert E Stonestree
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, prompted 3w, coaxed along 1/2, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd near rear, coaxed 7/16, cut corner, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Scotland
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, to ins 1/2, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, yielded, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 13 1M Dirt CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. INNER TURF (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARRO SMASH broke in and bumped hard with a foe, bumped with opponents on both sides shortly thereafter then was taken in hand, was bumped yet again by a rival and was taken up, went five then four wide on the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside, ranged up four wide on the far turn, was asked at the five-sixteenths, took a short lead at the quarter-pole, dueled outside of the runner-up into the final sixteenth then moved clear under steady urging to prevail. COALVILLE went four then three wide on the first turn, contested the pace between horses then inside of a rival starting around the nine-sixteenths, vied in the two path while asked on the far turn, spun three wide into the stretch, dueled inside of the winner into the final sixteenth and was outfinished while well clear for the place. PARTY WITH SMARTY was bumped hard at the start, shied out and bumped with a foe early then came out and bumped again, was taken up in the process, saved ground on the first turn, settled near the rear, was urged while moving from the inside to the two path on the far turn, came between horses at the three-eighths pole and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. FLAT TOP BOX was hustled from the gate, lugged out some early, went three then two wide on the first turn, contested the pace on the inside of rivals, dropped back near the nine-sixteenths, was urged along passing the half-mile pole, saved ground on the far turn, shifted three wide at the quarter-pole, came out in front of a rival in upper stretch and had nothing left. MOTIVO leaned in and brushed the gate, bumped with rivals on both sides early then checked, pulled hard while six then five wide on the first turn, dragged his way to the front onto the backstretch, lost the lead at the five-eighths, vied in the three path on the far turn, dropped back at the quarter-pole and capitulated. MAGIADORO was bumped on both sides after the start then taken up, went around the first turn in the two path, settled at the rear, was urged four wide on the far turn, was taken in hand while off heels in upper stretch and faltered then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Top Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2p1st,ins foes,drp bck 4-1/2,ins2nd,3w1/4,came out 3/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Party With Smarty
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd hard brk,bmpd early,ins1st,settled,ins-2p2nd,up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Arro Smash
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,bmpd hard,bmpd btwn,tkn up,bmpd,4-5w turns,dueled,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Magiadoro
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd btwn after brk,tkn up,2p1st,4p2nd,off heels3/16,falter,eased

ENTRY.NAME: Motivo
ENTRY.COMMENT: brsh gate,bmp aftr brk,tkn up,bmp btwn,6-5p,pull hard,3p2nd,tired

ENTRY.OWNER: Lawrence William H Drown Jeffrey Rachel Don Don Alberto Stable and Bridlewood Fa
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w1st,pace btwn,inside foe 4-1/2,2path turn,3p1/4,duel,outfnshd
